sqlMap.statement: SELECT STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_PK FROM SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = #shipToCustCd# AND STC.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_PK FROM SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STC.BIG_DEAL_NUM = #bigDealNum#
